author: Sam Fraser
description: Looking over the liqueur and syrup dominated recipe, this mezcal-based cocktail would appear to be sweet. However, the spec is deceiving, and the finished drink is surprisingly balanced, harnessing some big flavours and presenting them harmoniously.
name: The Alchemist
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
